mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drug( id, pid, drug_code, drug_name, drug_count, drug_price, drug_spec, form_code, total_dose, route_code, rate, rate_unit, dose, doseUnit ) VALUES ( #{drug.id}, #{pid}, #{drug.drugCode}, #{drug.drugName}, #{drug.drugCount}, #{drug.drugPrice}, #{drug.drugSpec}, #{drug.formCode}, #{drug.totalDose}, #{drug.routeCode}, #{drug.rate}, #{drug.rateUnit}, #{drug.dose}, #{drug.doseUnit} )
mapper.select: SELECT `id` AS id, pid AS pid, drug_code AS drugCode, drug_name AS drugName, drug_count AS drugCount, drug_price AS drugPrice, drug_spec AS drugSpec, form_code AS formCode, total_dose AS totalDose, route_code AS routeCode, rate AS rate, rate_unit AS rateUnit, dose AS dose, doseUnit AS doseUnit FROM drug WHERE pid = #{pid}
